instruction: theorem AP_1 (A : ℝ) (f : ℝ → ℝ) (h₁ : A > 0) (h₂ : Tendsto f atBot (𝓝 A)) : ∃ X : ℝ, X > 0 ∧ (∀ x < -X, A < 2 * f x ∧ 2 * f x < 3 * A) := by sorry

initialize.expr: theorem AP_1 (A : ℝ) (f : ℝ → ℝ) (h₁ : A > 0) (h₂ : Tendsto f atBot (𝓝 A)) : ∃ X : ℝ, X > 0 ∧ (∀ x < -X, A < 2 * f x ∧ 2 * f x < 3 * A) := by sorry
